languages.text: "Я верю в милосердие. Даже к таким, как ты".
"I believe in mercy. Even for the likes of you."
languages.original_text: "Я верю в милосердие. Даже к таким, как ты".

traits.locale_text: "I believe in mercy. Even for the likes of you."
"I believe in mercy. Even for the likes of you."
"I believe in mercy. Even for the likes of you."
"I believe in mercy. Even for the likes of you."

languages.text: “我相信仁慈的力量，即便对你这样的人也不例外。”
languages.original_text: "I believe in mercy. Even for the likes of you."

traits.locale_text: “我相信仁慈的力量，即便对你这样的人也不例外。”

languages.text: « Je crois que tout le monde mérite la miséricorde. Même les monstres comme vous. »
languages.original_text: "I believe in mercy. Even for the likes of you."

traits.locale_text: « Je crois que tout le monde mérite la miséricorde. Même les monstres comme vous. »

languages.text: «Creo en la misericordia. Incluso para alguien como tú».
languages.original_text: "I believe in mercy. Even for the likes of you."

traits.locale_text: «Creo en la misericordia. Incluso para alguien como tú».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}は慈悲を信じている。相手がお前のような奴でもな」
languages.original_text: "I believe in mercy. Even for the likes of you."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}は慈悲を信じている。相手がお前のような奴でもな」

languages.text: "Ich glaube an Gnade. Selbst für Euresgleichen."
languages.original_text: "I believe in mercy. Even for the likes of you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube an Gnade. Selbst für Euresgleichen."

languages.text: "Merhamete inancım sarsılmazdır. Senin gibiler için bile."
languages.original_text: "I believe in mercy. Even for the likes of you."

traits.locale_text: "Merhamete inancım sarsılmazdır. Senin gibiler için bile."
